author: SD456
post_text: September 11, 2017 at 12:17 PM#1Hello everyone!I would like make a macro to select only those fixtures and channels which have value.Let me explain what I want.So, I have a scene made from multiple executors, I set the first one (with 6 dimmers), at lets say 30. The second at 45 (another 6 dimmer), and the third one at 75 (4 fixtures).How can I select only those dimmers, channels and fixtures, which have values to them?Thanks for the help in advance!

posts.post_text: September 12, 2017 at 1:53 AM#2I think what you are looking for is the keywordIfOutput.To activate the selcected channels for storing double-press Enter.greetingsMatthias

title: How can I select only those channels/fixtures which have value.
